description.value: FluidConsistencyType : Codes used to represent the consistency of fluids and liquids provided to the patient. This value set includes concepts from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct)(US Extension) where concept is a 435681000124103 (Dietary liquid consistency diet (regime/therapy)). It is provided as a suggestive example.
